name: Color stars
description:
Easy, fun and enjoyable game for all adults and children. Just try this new exciting game to relax and train your brain.

Complete challenging puzzles and get as many points as possible.
Compete with your friends and set new records.

Features Of Color Stars :
★ Easy to control and fun to play.
★ Addictive and great puzzle game.
★ Ability to play for FREE and without Wi-Fi ! Enjoy Color Stars anytime, anywhere!
★ No time limit. You can enjoy Color Stars at your own pace!

HOW TO PLAY? 
• Arrange and fold the colored stars vertically, horizontally, and diagonally.
• As soon as you collect a line of stars of the same color, they will disappear and make room for new stars.
• The game will be over if there is no room for a new star.
• Try to remove multiple lines at the same time to get more points! Make different combinations to earn combos!! 

And how many points will you get in the game Color Stars ? Let's play!
Download this puzzle game now!
